definition: the act of pulling up or out
details:
noun
- the act of pulling up or out
= synonyms: extirpation
- the act of banishing a member of a church from the communion of believers and the privileges of the church
= synonyms: excommunication
- surgical removal of a body part or tissue
= synonyms: extirpation
- the omission that is made when an editorial change shortens a written passage
= synonyms: deletion, cut
